book.Title: NeedleSpeech
book.page: {{m|Delight in the separation of mind from flesh!}}
{{m|Thus, the mind is stripped bare from vacuous flesh!}}
{{m|Do you not rejoice, in each puncture of the skull?}}
{{m|Glory to the hand that wields and Glory to the Needle that pierces!}}
{{m|Woe to all that stand against us!}}
{{m|Blessed is the hand that guides the Needle in its skewering!}}
{{m|Can you not feel it? Each mind hungers to be struck from the flesh!}}
{{m|The mind hungers for perforation, and the Needle is eager to provide!}}
{{m|Rejoice, all things in need of puncturing, for thine puncturer is here!}}
{{m|Do you not delight in the skewering?}}
{{m|Wielder mine, bear witness as I puncture all that stand against thee!}}
{{m|Wielder mine, bear witness to this next perforation!}}
{{m|Together we carve a bloodied path, wielder mine!}}
